pkgmetadata.longdescription: ABOUT ICINGA2APIicinga2api is a Python module to interact with the Icinga 2 RESTful API.FEATURES1. basic and certificate auth2. config file support3. objects (zone support)4. actions5. events6. statusDEVELOPING1.
